<column gap="tiny">

While study is key to your success, a bit of magic can be a helpful aid in discovering the secrets of the past. You can cast [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1485), [_guidance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1549), and [_read aura_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1646) as occult innate cantrips.
